AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Pattern matching AWS Access Key IDs, often found in environment configs or credentials files.

SSH_PRIVATE_KEY_HEADER.description: Header indicating the presence of a private cryptographic key.

GENERIC_PASSWORD_ASSIGNMENT.description: General pattern looking for common variable names associated with secrets.

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: Specific URL pattern for Slack integration webhooks.

GCP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_KEY.description: Indicates a Google Cloud Platform service account JSON key is present.

EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: Detection of common email address formats.

US_SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER.description: Detection of US Social Security Numbers (SSN) in the XXX-XX-XXXX format.

GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: Detection of modern GitHub Personal Access Tokens (PAT) starting with ghp_, ghs_, or gho_.

AZURE_STORAGE_KEY.description: Detection of Azure Storage Account Keys (88 characters, Base64-encoded, ends with ==).

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Detection of Stripe Secret API Keys (live or test). These control payment processing.
